sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Github, Mail, ExternalLink, Cpu, Terminal, Database, Code } from 'lucide-react'; import './styles.css'; import CyberLayout from './components/CyberLayout'; import CyberHeader from './components/CyberHeader'; import CyberHero from './components/CyberHero'; import ProjectTerminal from './components/ProjectTerminal'; import WireframeReveal from './components/WireframeReveal'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; const Home = () => { const [isModalOpen, setIsModalOpen] = useState(false); const scrollToSection = (id) => { const element = document.getElementById(id); if (element) { element.scrollIntoView({ behavior: 'smooth' }); } }; return ( {/* --- Projects (New AI App) --- */}

LATEST_PROJECT

AI-Powered Prototyper

An experimental tool that generates React components directly from natural language prompts. Built to accelerate the "Idea to Prototype" cycle.

OPENAI API Next.js
{/* --- About --- */}

USER_DATA

PROFILE

NAME: HISHIKAWA YUKI

LOC: SAITAMA_PREF_JP

CLASS: CREATOR / ENGINEER

BACKGROUND

  • MSc in Applied Biology (Kyoto Institute of Tech)
  • Production Engineer @ Asahi Soft Drinks (7 years)
  • Web Development (Vocational Training)
  • Chat Commerce Ops @ Algoage

SKILLS

{['React', 'TypeScript', 'Node.js', 'Figma', 'Python', 'Git'].map(skill => ( {skill} ))}
{/* --- Works --- */}

EXECUTABLES

{/* Figma Plugin */}

Figma Layer to YAML

Automated code generation plugin.

setIsModalOpen(true)} />
SOURCE
{/* Diagnosis App */}

Personality Diagnosis

LINE LIFF Application.

DEMO {/* Ad Chatbot */}

Ad Chatbot

CV Optimization Chatbot.

DEMO
{/* --- Contact --- */}

COMMUNICATION

MAIL GITHUB
{/* Modal for Images */} {isModalOpen && (
setIsModalOpen(false)}>

[CLICK TO CLOSE]

)} ); }; export default Home;
